name: CAELUM CORE
description:
PREMISE: Your space mobile suit parts are scattered across the Asteroid Belt, thanks to a solar  storm knocking you and your guidance systems out of orbit.. Make your way through the asteroid belt and reattach the parts to escape the dangerous terrain.

[how to play]

Use the  <  Button to go Left. Use the  >  Button to go Right

Use the  ^  Button to go Up.

Hold the  ^  Button and press < or > to change the direction of a Jump

Wall Jump by changing direction multiple times.
